title: Deadpool to join Avengers? Ryan Reynolds’ cryptic post hints at wild crossover amid Doomsday frenzy
description: Ryan Reynolds stirred massive excitement by hinting that Deadpool could join the Avengers in the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday film. His cryptic post left fans guessing and buzzing on social media. While many stars remain unconfirmed, fans eagerly await to see if Deadpool will have a cameo or a bigger role.
content:
Ryan Reynolds just surprised his fans with a cryptic post that has everyone talking. Known worldwide as the witty and irreverent Deadpool, Reynolds on Tuesday dropped a simple image of the iconic Avengers logo on Instagram without a caption, just a shocked “WHAT” and a side-eye emoji. This brief post sent Marvel fans into a frenzy, fuelling speculation that Deadpool might officially join the Avengers in the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday movie slated for 2026 release.

Though Marvel’s initial cast list for Robert Downey Jr starrer Avengers: Doomsday didn’t include Reynolds or Deadpool, his social media hint has made fans wonder if the famous anti-hero will make an appearance.

Will Deadpool have a cameo or a bigger role in Avengers: Doomsday?

Ryan Reynolds’ post leaves open many questions. Will Deadpool simply appear briefly in a cameo, teasing future MCU developments? Or could the beloved character have a larger, more significant role alongside the Avengers? Fans have expressed a mix of hope and caution online, with some jokingly pleading with Reynolds not to raise their hopes too high.

Given Deadpool’s unique style and rating difference from other MCU films, how the character fits into the Avengers’ story remains a hot topic. Only time will tell if this teaser turns into a full-fledged crossover.

What is the confirmed cast in Avengers: Doomsday?

The initial cast reveal for Avengers: Doomsday included many fan favorites:

However, some popular actors and characters were notably missing from the list, including Tom Holland’s Spider-Man and Mark Ruffalo’s Hulk. The absence of these key figures has left fans eager to see if these characters will make surprise appearances or have larger roles. Marvel has confirmed some cameos but is keeping a tight lid on the full cast, building suspense for the film’s release.
summary: Ryan Reynolds, known as the Deadpool character, has sparked speculation that he may join the Avengers in the upcoming Avengers: Doomsday movie, set for release in 2026. The initial cast list for the movie did not include Reynolds or Deadpool. This has led to speculation that Deadpool may have a significant role in the movie. However, due to his unique style and storyline, it is unclear if this will be a full-fledged crossover.
shortSummary: Ryan Reynolds' cryptic Instagram post hints at a potential Avengers: Doomsday crossover, with Reynolds in doubt and fans awaiting confirmed roles.
argos_summary: Ryan Reynolds sparked excitement among fans with a cryptic Instagram post featuring the Avengers logo, leading to speculation about Deadpool's potential involvement in the upcoming film Avengers: Doomsday, set for release in 2026. Although Deadpool was not included in the initial cast list, fans are curious whether he will have a cameo or a more significant role. The post has ignited discussions about how Deadpool's unique character could fit into the Avengers storyline, while the confirmed cast remains a mix of fan favorites, leaving room for surprises.
